description:
Are you tired of being excessively busy and overwhelmed?  Through this course, get the time management skills you need to live a happier, simpler life.  Prioritize, organize and simplify your life so you can focus on what you enjoy most.

Create A Life You Love Using A Proven Approach To Time Management

  • Reduce stress and anxiety
  • Say goodbye to unrealistic to-do lists
  • Use new tools to design an amazingly productive day
  • Discover the one question you need to ask at night to prepare for tomorrow
  • Create meaningful 90-day goals
  • Cut through the chaos and disorganization
  • Free up time and energy
  • Sharpen your focus and overcome distraction


Change your life with these easy-to-follow time management strategies.

A horde of time management guru’s will promise you how to get more done.  But, what good is getting more done, if you don’t include the activities you most want, such as, time for family, resting, exercising, pursuing goals, and enjoying your hobbies. Get more done with this course, but more importantly, learn how to live happier and simpler life.

What’s so unique about this course is that this isn’t just a bunch of theory.  I share real life examples and equip you with worksheets you can fill out instantly to create immediate results. 

You will learn: Time Management Skill Sets

  • Think
  • Plan
  • Clarify
  • Set Goals
  • Develop Projects
  • Prioritize
  • Sequence
  • Create a Daily Written Plan of Action
  • 5 before 11
  • Micro-Actions
  • Set Milestones
  • Accountability
  • Make Decisions
  • Start and Completely Finish


Course And Overview

This class is perfect for anyone feeling overwhelmed by life, whether you are a busy mom or a corporate executive.  Through 12 videos I walk you step-by-step from the most basic understanding of time management, to a powerful process for planning your day.  Worksheets are provided to help you immediately put to use your new found time management skills.  As a time management thought leader and trainer, I have taught this process to tens of thousands of people to change their lives.

We’ll begin with 7 simple steps to boost your daily productivity.  Once you understand this, you will have time to discover who you want to be. I will show you how to translate that vision into compelling goals that can be accomplished by taking tiny steps. As I say, “Change happens in an instant. It happens the moment you DECIDE to change.” 

IMPROVING YOUR TIME MANAGEMENT AND PERSONAL GROWTH

  • Purpose
  • Happiness
  • Simplicity
  • Action
  • Organize
  • Simplify
  • De-Clutter
  • Attention
  • Focus 
  • Concentration
  • Determination
  • Imagination
  • Innovation
  • Perseverance
  • Accountability
  • Challenge
  • Motivation
  • Authenticity
  • Congruence


You will discover why most people (and, this probably includes you) are unknowingly putting tasks on their to-do list that can’t get done.  But, after this class you won’t make that mistake.  You are going to know the three criteria a task needs to be actionable.  Won’t it be great to quickly and easily check things off your list?

Once you understand the limits of only having 24 hours in a day, I will share with you a simple time management tracking worksheet that reveals where all your time is going.  This will help you know EXACTLY what to prune from your busy schedule.

Lastly, you will do away with your busy schedule by replacing it with a daily written plan of action and explore how you can use free tools to sustain positive personal change for a life of greater hope, happiness, and productivity.


BONUS MATERIALS: 

  • 20+ time management worksheets, tools, and checklists
  • Strategic Business Plan Templates


Instructor: Allyson Lewis

Length: Approximately 75 minutes

12 Segments
title: Time Management & Organization: Live a Happier, Simpler Life
